  • Method Details

    • initializeMessage

      public void initializeMessage()
      Initializes the welcome message and sets the player's pawn icon based on their color. This method updates the welcome label with the player's username and sets the player's pawn icon image accordingly.

    • startGame

      public void startGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
